duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate technical maintenance, upgrade, and enhancement/configuration of the HCM application to support Core HR, Compensation, Payroll, Time & Labor, and Talent Management requirements.
Provide project support to upgrade existing functionality of the HCM application by gathering requirements, documenting configurations, testing, and launching plans.
Resolve HCM system errors by identifying, researching, and logging issues for resolution, and partnering with technical practitioners.
Facilitate new HCM system enhancements by assessing requests, scoping requirements, and delivering agreed-upon solutions.
Collaborate with functional stakeholders to provide ongoing support and coordinate user acceptance testing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
